description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Young Buglers. A tale of the Peninsular War ... With ... illustrations by J. Proctor, etc", "Single Works" Author: Henty, G. A. (George Alfred) Contributor: PROCTOR, John - Artist Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12641.d.4." Page: 240 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1880 Publisher: Griffith and Farran Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001656541 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
